attributes.action: Raise pay for NHS workers and reward them substantially for their Covid work
attributes.additional_details: This petition asks parliament to assess properly whether the pay for nurses and health care workers equates with the essential jobs they undertake. The 1% increase in pay doesn’t reward the nurses for the dedication and bravery they have shown and doesn’t reflect what the majority of the public want the award to be.
attributes.background: This petition urges parliament to reassess the current 1% pay rise for nurses and put it in context of the huge personal sacrifices NHS health workers have made, extra hours worked, not going home until well after the end of their shifts & incredible bravery in putting themselves on the front line
